testcase.name: URL is leading us into the correct page
display hints for the username and password fields
testcase.system-out: Given the user nevigate to login url........................................passed When the user checks username text field....................................passed And the user checks password text field.....................................passed Then username displays hint as email........................................passed And password displays hint as password......................................passed

testcase.name: validate that checkbox 'Keep me signed in' is positioned between password field and sign in button
testcase.system-out: Given the user nevigate to url..............................................passed When the user reaches Keep me Signed in checkbox............................passed Then Validate 'keep me signed in' checbox is between password and sign button.passed

testcase.name: validate that forgot your password? link is displayed below Sign in button
testcase.system-out: Given the user nevigate to url..............................................passed When the user reaches Forgot your password link.............................passed Then Validate Forgot your password link is below sign in button.............passed

testcase.name: validate that all fields are visible and fields should not overlap when
testcase.system-out: Given the user nevigate to url..............................................passed When the user reduced the browser to minimum width..........................passed Then validate that all fields are visible and clickable.....................passed

testcase.name: Enter invalid Email address and Password, an error message should be displayed
testcase.system-out: Given the user nevigate to url..............................................passed When the user enters invalid email..........................................passed And the user enters invalid password........................................passed Then display the error message..............................................passed

testcase.name: Enter valid Email address and Password in the respective fields
testcase.system-out: Given the user nevigate to url..............................................passed When the user enters the valid email........................................passed And the user enters the valid password......................................passed Then validate that User can enter the details as expected...................passed

testcase.name: user can sign into the application when entered correct credentials
